languages.text: "Возьми мое благословение и любое оружие из корабельного реликвария. Напои его кровью тех, кого посчитаешь недостойным".
"Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."
languages.original_text: "Возьми мое благословение и любое оружие из корабельного реликвария. Напои его кровью тех, кого посчитаешь недостойным".

traits.locale_text: "Take my blessing and any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy, for that is your sacred right as a chosen one."
"Take my blessing and any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy, for that is your sacred right as a chosen one."
"Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy, for that is your sacred right as a chosen one."
"Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy, for that is your sacred right as a chosen one."
"Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."
"Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

languages.text: « Je vous offre ma bénédiction, ainsi que l'arme de votre choix parmi celles du reliquaire. Étanchez sa soif avec le sang de ceux que vous jugerez indignes. »
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous offre ma bénédiction, ainsi que l'arme de votre choix parmi celles du reliquaire. Étanchez sa soif avec le sang de ceux que vous jugerez indignes. »

languages.text: «Acepte mi bendición y cualquier arma que guste del relicario de la nave. Sacie su sed con la sangre de quienes considere indignos».
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

traits.locale_text: «Acepte mi bendición y cualquier arma que guste del relicario de la nave. Sacie su sed con la sangre de quienes considere indignos».

languages.text: “来，收下我赐予你的祝福吧。这艘船上所有的圣物武器，你都可以自行挑选。让那些你认为没有价值的渣滓血流成河吧。”
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

traits.locale_text: “来，收下我赐予你的祝福吧。这艘船上所有的圣物武器，你都可以自行挑选。让那些你认为没有价值的渣滓血流成河吧。”

languages.text: 「私の祝福を受け、船の聖具箱から好きな武器を持っていけ。お前がふさわしくないと見なす者の血で、その渇きを癒すのだ。これは選ばれし者としての神聖な権利だ」
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

traits.locale_text: 「私の祝福を受け、船の聖具箱から好きな武器を持っていけ。お前がふさわしくないと見なす者の血で、その渇きを癒すのだ。これは選ばれし者としての神聖な権利だ」

languages.text: "Nehmt meinen Segen und eine beliebige Waffe aus dem Reliquiar des Schiffs. Stillt ihren Durst mit dem Blut derer, die Ihr für unwürdig befindet."
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmt meinen Segen und eine beliebige Waffe aus dem Reliquiar des Schiffs. Stillt ihren Durst mit dem Blut derer, die Ihr für unwürdig befindet."

languages.text: "Seni kutsuyorum ve geminin kutsal emanet odasından istediğin silahı almana izin veriyorum. Silahın susuzluğunu, yaşamaya layık görmediklerinin kanıyla dindir."
languages.original_text: "Take my blessing, along with any weapon you like from the ship's reliquary. Quench its thirst with the blood of those you deem unworthy."
